subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: The Japanese term ''tsue'' can refer generally to a [[stick]] or [[staff]] of various lengths, as expressed by the range of English meanings apparent in the senses above.

subSections.title: Noun
Compounds
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|錫%杖|しゃく%じょう}}: a khakkhara, a Buddhist monk's "sounding staff"
